verses.verse: Give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for he is good, <S%H2896><s%> for his loving kindness <S%H2896><s%> endures forever. <S%H5769><s%>
Let the redeemed <S%H1350><s%> by Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> say <S%H559><s%> so, <S%H1350><s%> whom he has redeemed from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the adversary, <S%H6862><s%>
And gathered <S%H6908><s%> out of the lands, <S%H776><s%> from the east <S%H4217><s%> and from the west, <S%H4628><s%> from the north <S%H6828><s%> and from the south. <S%H3220><s%>
They wandered <S%H8582><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> in a desert <S%H3452><s%> way. <S%H1870><s%> They found <S%H4672><s%> no city <S%H5892><s%> to live in. <S%H4186><s%>
Hungry <S%H7457><s%> and thirsty, <S%H6771><s%> their soul <S%H5315><s%> fainted in them. <S%H5848><s%>
Then they cried <S%H6817><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in their trouble, <S%H6862><s%> and he delivered <S%H5337><s%> them out of their distresses, <S%H4691><s%>
he led <S%H1869><s%> them also by a straight <S%H3477><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> that they might go <S%H3212><s%> to a city <S%H5892><s%> to live in. <S%H4186><s%>
Let them praise <S%H3034><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> for his loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> for his wonderful works <S%H6381><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of men! <S%H120><s%>
For he satisfies <S%H7646><s%> the longing <S%H8264><s%> soul. <S%H5315><s%> He fills <S%H4390><s%> the hungry <S%H7457><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> with good. <S%H2896><s%>
Some sat <S%H3427><s%> in darkness <S%H2822><s%> and in the shadow of death, <S%H6757><s%> being bound <S%H615><s%> in affliction <S%H6040><s%> and iron, <S%H1270><s%>
because they rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against the words <S%H561><s%> of God, <S%H410><s%> and condemned the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the Most High. <S%H5945><s%>
Therefore he brought down <S%H3665><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> with labor. <S%H5999><s%> They fell down, <S%H3782><s%> and there was none to help. <S%H5826><s%>
Then they cried <S%H2199><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in their trouble, <S%H6862><s%> and he saved <S%H3467><s%> them out of their distresses. <S%H4691><s%>
He brought them out <S%H3318><s%> of darkness <S%H2822><s%> and the shadow of death, <S%H6757><s%> and broke <S%H5423><s%> their bonds <S%H4147><s%> in sunder. <S%H5423><s%>
Let them praise <S%H3034><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> for his loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> for his wonderful works <S%H6381><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of men! <S%H120><s%>
For he has broken <S%H7665><s%> the gates <S%H1817><s%> of brass, <S%H5178><s%> and cut <S%H1438><s%> through <S%H1438><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> of iron. <S%H1270><s%>
Fools <S%H191><s%> are afflicted <S%H6031><s%> because <S%H1870><s%> of their disobedience, <S%H6588><s%> and because of their iniquities. <S%H5771><s%>
Their soul <S%H5315><s%> abhors <S%H8581><s%> all kinds of food. <S%H400><s%> They draw near <S%H5060><s%> to the gates <S%H8179><s%> of death. <S%H4194><s%>
Then they cry <S%H2199><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in their trouble, <S%H6862><s%> he saves <S%H3467><s%> them out of their distresses. <S%H4691><s%>
He sends <S%H7971><s%> his word, <S%H1697><s%> and heals <S%H7495><s%> them, <S%H4422><s%> and delivers them from their graves. <S%H7825><s%>
Let them praise <S%H3034><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> for his loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> for his wonderful works <S%H6381><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of men! <S%H120><s%>
Let them offer the sacrifices <S%H2076><s%> of thanksgiving, <S%H8426><s%> and declare <S%H5608><s%> his works <S%H4639><s%> with singing. <S%H7440><s%>
Those who go down <S%H3381><s%> to the sea <S%H3220><s%> in ships, <S%H591><s%> who do <S%H6213><s%> business <S%H4399><s%> in great <S%H7227><s%> waters; <S%H4325><s%>
These see <S%H7200><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s works, <S%H4639><s%> and his wonders <S%H6381><s%> in the deep. <S%H4688><s%>
For he commands, <S%H559><s%> and raises <S%H5975><s%> the stormy <S%H5591><s%> wind, <S%H7307><s%> which lifts up <S%H7311><s%> its waves. <S%H1530><s%>
They mount up <S%H5927><s%> to the sky; <S%H8064><s%> they go down <S%H3381><s%> again to the depths. <S%H8415><s%> Their soul <S%H5315><s%> melts <S%H4127><s%> away because of trouble. <S%H7451><s%>
They reel back and forth, <S%H2287><s%> and stagger <S%H5128><s%> like a drunken man, <S%H7910><s%> and are at their wits <S%H2451><s%>' end. <S%H1104><s%>
Then they cry <S%H6817><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in their trouble, <S%H6862><s%> and he brings them out <S%H3318><s%> of their distress. <S%H4691><s%>
He makes <S%H6965><s%> the storm <S%H5591><s%> a calm, <S%H1827><s%> so that its waves <S%H1530><s%> are still. <S%H2814><s%>
Then they are glad <S%H8055><s%> because it is calm, <S%H8367><s%> so he brings <S%H5148><s%> them to their desired <S%H2656><s%> haven. <S%H4231><s%>
Let them praise <S%H3034><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> for his loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> for his wonderful works <S%H6381><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of men! <S%H120><s%>
Let them exalt <S%H7311><s%> him also in the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and praise <S%H1984><s%> him in the seat <S%H4186><s%> of the elders. <S%H2205><s%>
He turns <S%H7760><s%> rivers <S%H5104><s%> into a desert, <S%H4057><s%> water springs <S%H4325><s%> into a thirsty ground, <S%H6774><s%>
and a fruitful <S%H6529><s%> land <S%H776><s%> into a salt <S%H4420><s%> waste, <S%H7451><s%> for the wickedness of those who dwell in it. <S%H3427><s%>
He turns <S%H7760><s%> a desert <S%H4057><s%> into a pool <S%H98><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> and a dry <S%H6723><s%> land <S%H776><s%> into water springs. <S%H4325><s%>
There he makes the hungry <S%H7457><s%> live, <S%H3427><s%> that they may prepare <S%H3559><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> to live in, <S%H4186><s%>
sow <S%H2232><s%> fields, <S%H7704><s%> plant <S%H5193><s%> vineyards, <S%H3754><s%> and reap <S%H6213><s%> the fruits <S%H6529><s%> of increase. <S%H8393><s%>
He blesses <S%H1288><s%> them also, <S%H7235><s%> so that they are multiplied greatly. <S%H3966><s%> He doesn't <S%H4591><s%> allow their livestock <S%H929><s%> to decrease. <S%H4591><s%>
Again, <S%H4591><s%> they are diminished and bowed down <S%H7817><s%> through oppression, <S%H6115><s%> trouble, <S%H7451><s%> and sorrow. <S%H3015><s%>
He pours <S%H8210><s%> contempt <S%H937><s%> on princes, <S%H5081><s%> and causes them to wander <S%H8582><s%> in a trackless <S%H1870><s%> waste. <S%H8414><s%>
Yet he lifts the needy <S%H34><s%> out <S%H7682><s%> of their affliction, <S%H6040><s%> and increases <S%H7760><s%> their families <S%H4940><s%> like a flock. <S%H6629><s%>
The upright <S%H3477><s%> will see <S%H7200><s%> it, <S%H8055><s%> and be glad. All the wicked <S%H5766><s%> will shut <S%H7092><s%> their mouths. <S%H6310><s%>
Whoever is wise <S%H2450><s%> will pay attention <S%H8104><s%> to these things. <S%H995><s%> They will consider the loving kindnesses <S%H2617><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
